Class HandData

  • public class HandData
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents data about a specific hand.

    giovanni

    • Constructor Detail

      • HandData

        public HandData(short id,
        Point2D<java.lang.Float> position,
        Point2D<java.lang.Float> projectedPosition,
        boolean touching)
        Parameters:
        id - The unique ID of the hand
        position - The 2D position of the hand on the virtual screen (in world coordinates)
        projectedPosition - The 2D position of the hand in depth coordinates
        touching - Whether the hand is touching the virtual screen or not

    • Method Detail

        public short getId()
        Returns:
        the unique ID of the hand

      • getPosition

        public Point2D<java.lang.Float> getPosition()
        Returns:
        the 2D position of the hand on the virtual screen (in real coordinates)

      • getProjectedPosition

        public Point2D<java.lang.Float> getProjectedPosition()
        Returns:
        the 2D position in depth coordinates

      • isTouching

        public boolean isTouching()
        Returns:
        true if the hand is touching the virtual screen, false otherwise
